intro: Ruschia polita, commonly known as the silver leaf Ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its silver-green, fleshy leaves and produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of pink and white. It is a succulent that thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it suitable for rock gardens and xeriscaping. Ruschia polita is also valued for its drought tolerance and ornamental appeal.
